Text:
thanks 2040 :-)
good to see them back in a different way...
Bad airing, many drop-outs, cannot be "fixed", but - it's funny. And just for preview.

Thanks for this.

Sadly I didn't find it much different to the original podcasts. Ex-radio producer plays 'genuine full-time idiot' (possibly a bit autistic) for internet creeps to 'discover' and ridicule, non-stop, like, 4real. Sad and crude.
